text: (unaka ehad) kyonkar (rah sakata hai) jab (unakee ye haalat hai) ki agar tum par galaba pa jaen to tumhaare mein na to rishte naate hee ka lihaaz karegen aur na apane qaul va qaraar ka ye log tumhen apanee zabaanee (jama kharch mein) khush kar dete hain haaloki unake dil nahin maanate aur unamen ke bahutere to badachalan hain
